resources.string:
Hi,I am Masum Billah. 

I am a peach loving person. I love Islam. 
My favourite person in the world is my mom. My favourite color is Light Blue. My favourite dish is Chicken Burger, kalavuna(beef) etc. I also like oil fried food for evening. 
My Educational qualifications are very bad. I have no GPA 5 in any public examination. It is a sorrowfull matter for me and my family members. I have no big achievement in my entire life. The only achievement of mine is to get chance into different public Universities. Among all the universities, I selected RU to study in CSE. 
Currently, I am studying at Computer Science & Engineering. 
University of Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
